content: this free pattern is the base for a doll i m calling the pocket guy my goal with this series is to make a highly customizable doll you can design however you want i m continuously adding to this series with various accessories such as hats jackets pants and more this doll works up quickly uses very little yarn and is low-sew materials needed - worsted weight 4 yarn - 4mm hook - scissors - yarn needle - polyfill/stuffing - stitch marker - 8mm safety eye notes - this pattern is worked in the round i highly recommend using a stitch marker to keep track of your rounds - you will need to know how to make a single_crochet single_crochet slip st slip_stitch and single_crochet decrease scdec if you struggle to make a magic_ring you can make a slip knot and chain 2 work your first round into the second chain from hook - the number in parenthesis at the end of each round is the amount of sts you should have in that round - all loose ends can be tucked into the doll as you make it up or when you re done - your doll will be about 6 in or 15 cm tall
